tasks.label: py: run current file
tasks.command: start=$(date +%s); ${config:python.defaultInterpreterPath} "${file}" --verbose True --log-level DEBUG; exit_code=$?; end=$(date +%s); elapsed=$((end - start)); printf "Elapsed: %02d:%02d:%02d\n" $((elapsed/3600)) $(((elapsed%3600)/60)) $((elapsed%60)); exit $exit_code
